meaningMnemonic: The kanji is <kanji>distract</kanji> and the adjective version is <vocabulary>confusing</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>misleading</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: You know who is particularly <vocabulary>confusing</vocabulary>? That <reading>maggie</reading> (まぎ) girl. She's confusing because she uses <reading>magi</reading>c (まぎ). Think of a Maggie you know, if possible.
